When The Crazy Ones was scrapped, Williams slipped into a deep depression, a source told Radaronline. He felt embarrassed and humiliated. It was very hard for Robin to accept. Here he was in his 60s, and forced to take a role on television for the money. Its just not where he thought he would be at this point in his life.
